hero.subtitle: Ukuthenga okulula nokusheshayo. Ayikho imifomo eyinkimbinkimbi. Thola impahla yakho ithunyelwe esitolo sakho.
hero.communitySupported: Joyina amashophu angaphezu kwama-500 endaweni yakho

support.defaultMessage: Sawubona! Ngidinga usizo nge-oda yami ye-TOSS.

groupBuying.title: Ukuthenga Ngeqembu - Amanani Amahle
groupBuying.description: Joyina nabanye abanikazi bezitolo endaweni yakho ukuze nithenga impahla ndawonye futhi nithole amanani okuthengisa. Usuku olufanayo lokulethwa kwabanye bonke!
groupBuying.benefit1: Sindisa kuze kube ngu-20% ekuthengeni okuningi

outForDelivery.title: Isendleleni
outForDelivery.description: Umshayeli uletha impahla yakho esitolo sakho

offline.title: Awukho ku-inthanethi
offline.message: Ezinye izici zingase zingasebenzi ngaphandle kwe-inthanethi. Sizogcina umsebenzi wakho futhi sivumelanise uma usubuya ku-inthanethi.
